jd:
Hello Professionals,

This Azhar Mohammad from Softcom Systems INC. I have a below Job Opportunity if you have any Consultants Please let me know…!!

**Job Title**: SQL Developer with Admin  
**Location**: Jacksonville, FL 32224 (Remote)  
**Duration**: 12 Months  

**Must Have Skills**:  
• Strong experience in SQL database development using TSQL  
• Experience as an Application DBA  
• Performance tuning, and troubleshooting  

**Nice to have skills**:  
• Extraction Transformation and Loading (ETL) processes using frameworks like SSIS  

**Detailed Job Description**:  
• Design and develop database structures, stored procedures, views, and functions to support application development projects.  
• Perform database administration tasks including installation, configuration, upgrades, performance tuning, and troubleshooting.  

**Top 3 responsibilities you would expect the Subcon to shoulder and execute**:  
• Document the database environment and maintain up-to-date records of all the databases  
• Provide support and guidance during the application release cycle, including deployment and post-deployment activities.  
• Schema diagrams, system configurations, and backup schedules  

Thanks & Regards,  
Azhar Mohammad  
Softcom Systems Inc.
